item.description:
Please join Sue T. and about 20 +friends for an evening of
dancing and socializing. This is the largest Singles Dances in
NH, in a ballroom setting with the most tasteful variety of
people and ages you will find anywhere. Because of the
popularity of this Dance. Tables and seats will be hard to
hold, much past 8:30. Plus, the Cover Charge goes from $10 to
$12 after 9 pm. Please get there as close to 8 pm as possible.
So, I can introduce you to everyone at our tables. Also ask.
where Meetup is sitting as you pay at the door.
Host Susan T. at 603-235-9373
www.togethernh.com/singlesevents.html
The hotel is at Exit 8 off of Rte 3.

Proper attire is required. No jeans or sneakers, no work boots.

THANKS, Susan
item.how_to_find_us: Ask where "meetup" is sitting when you pay at the door

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: SINGLES DANCE - Nashua
